thread.title_full: Annual Award Ceremony to recognize LRU alumni (Lenoir-Rhyne University) - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Annual Award Ceremony to recognize LRU alumni (Lenoir-Rhyne University)
text: ( Source : Lenoir-Rhyne University ) As part of Homecoming 2015 , Lenoir-Rhyne University will host the annual Alumni Association Awards Ceremony on Friday, October 16 at 6:00 p.m. in Belk Centrum , with a social hour preceding the event at 5:00
